formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: Unique name for the plugin configuration.

formElement.label: VSTS/TFS endpoint:
formElement.documentation: VS Team Services endpoint (https://myaccount.visualstudio.com) or TFS server (scheme://server:port/tfs).

formElement.label: Collection name for TFS:
formElement.documentation: Collection name. If not defined, DefaultCollection will be used.

formElement.label: Credentials:
formElement.documentation: Username and password to connect to VSTS/TFS.

formElement.label: API versions:
formElement.htmlDocumentation: Versions for different APIs, one version per line. API names can look like wit/workitems, wit/wiql, git/repositories - generally, part of the API endpoint after the _apis part. If no version is provided, version 1.0 will be used.
